myTweets.title: Post
myTweets.description: It feels like only yesterday that I held you in my arms for the first time. Your beautiful face filled everyone's hearts with so much love. Now you are a month shy of being my 5-year-old kindergartener. To my strong-willed, intelligent, loving, hilarious, positive thinking sweetie... Daddy loves you forever <3
myTweets.author: @Claudia

myTweets.title: Post
